Collector Gutenhagen: Quite good. Now, listen carefully and take notes if you must. First, Golems send negative or positive numbers, but the numbers differ from each other.%% Second, one Golem will send a random number betweenn 1~100, but the Golem that does this changes day by day.%% Lastly, Golems exhaust their energy sending one final transmission before collapsing. We can get that log data if we watch carefully. Today's number is %num%. Collect all the log numbers until you have a value that is equal to %num%, and bring it to me. If you are as good as you say you are, you should be alright.
